member.name: T:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper
member.summary: Extensions for ExcelPackage.

member.name: F:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.MIN_ROW_INDEX
member.summary: Minimum row index in excel.

member.name: F:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.MIN_COLUMN_INDEX
member.summary: Minimum column index in excel.

member.name: F:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.MIN_COLUMN_CHAR
member.summary: Minimum column character in excel.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.AddWorksheet(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage,System.String)
member.summary: Add a new Worksheet to an ExcelPackage.
member.param: The name of the Worksheet.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.GetWorksheet(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage,System.String)
member.summary: Searches the ExcelPackage for a Worksheet by name.
member.param: The name of the Worksheet.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.AppendRow(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Object})
member.summary: Add a new row of data to the end of the Worksheet.
member.param: The data values for the row.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.GetRow(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all the values from one row, specified by the 0-indexed row number.
member.param: Row number, starting at 1.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.SetColumnByIndex(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Object},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set an entire column of values at once.
member.param: Integer index of column, starting at 1.
Data values for the column.
If true, values[0] is applied to row 2 instead of 1. Intended for indicating the first row is for headers.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.SetColumnByHeader(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Object})
member.summary: Set an entire column of values at once.
member.param: Header value of column.
Data values for the column. Should not include the header.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.SetColumnByChar(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Object},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set an entire column of values at once.
member.param: Character name of column. Example: "A", "Z", "AA".
Data values for the column.
If true, values[0] is applied to row 2 instead of 1. Intended for indicating the first row is for headers.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.GetColumnCharForHeader(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.String)
member.summary: Searches first row for a particular value.
member.param: Header value.
member.returns: Character name of the header's column, or null. Example: "A", "Z", "AA".

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.GetColumnByHeader(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all the values from one column, specified by the header value.
member.returns: List of data values, not including the header. Includes all cells to the bottom of the Worksheet.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.GetColumnByIndex(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all values from one column, specified by the integer index of the column.
member.param: Integer index of column, starting at 1.
If true, the first value in the column is not included. Intended for skipping the header value.
member.returns: List of data values. Includes all cells to the bottom of the Worksheet.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.GetColumnByChar(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all values from one column, specified by the character name of the column.
member.param: Character name of column. Example: "A", "Z", "AA".
If true, the first value in the column is not included. Intended for skipping the header value.
member.returns: List of data values. Includes all cells to the bottom of the Worksheet.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.CountRows(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet)
member.summary: Returns the number of rows in the Worksheet.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.CountColumns(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet)
member.summary: Returns the number of columns in the Worksheet.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.CountWorksheets(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage)
member.summary: Returns the number of Worksheets in the ExcelPacakge.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.ColumnChar(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert column integer index to character index.
member.param: 1-based index of column

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.ExcelPackageHelper.Clear(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet)
member.summary: Remove all rows and columns from Worksheet.

member.summary: Building a Microsoft Excel 2003 Xml file with XmlDocument.

member.summary: Sets up a default file containing no Worksheets.

member.summary: Load from file.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GetTableIndex(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the index of the Table in the Worksheet with the specified title.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.RemoveStyle(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a Style.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.AddWorksheet(System.String)
member.summary: Add a Worksheet to the end of the list of Worksheets, containing an empty Table.
member.param: Worksheet title.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.SetColumnWidths(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: Set column widths on the specified Table. Overwrites column widths if they were already set.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.AddHeaderRow(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Adds a Row of header-style Cells to the specified Table.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.AddRow(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Object})
member.summary: Creates Cells of the appropriate type for each value, and adds all Cells to a new Row in the specified Table.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.AddRow(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Xml.XmlNode})
member.summary: Adds all Cells to a new Row in the specified Table.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.AddColumns(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Object}})
member.summary: Creates Cells for each data values, adds sufficient Rows to the the specified Table to contain all the columns. Add all Cells to the Rows.
member.param: List of columns, each column being a list of values.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.AddColumns(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Xml.XmlNode}})
member.summary: Adds sufficient Rows to the the specified Table to contain all the columns. Add all Cells to the Rows.
member.param: List of columns, each column being a list of "Cell" tags.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GetRowValues(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of values from the Cells in the specified Row.
member.param: Zero-based index of Table in Workbook.
Zero-based index of Row in Table.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GetRowCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of Rows in the specified Table.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GetColumnCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of Columns in the specified Table.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GetHeaderIndex(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns zero-based index of the column with the selected header. Returns -1 if header is not found.
member.remarks: Only the first row in the table is searched for the header.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GetHeaders(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all the header values from the first row.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GetColumnValues(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of values from the Cells in the column with the specified header.
member.remarks: The first row is skipped as the header row.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GetColumnValues(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a list of values from the cells in the selected column.
member.param: If true, the first row of the table is skipped.

member.summary: Save file.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GenerateCell(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a Cell tag of the appropriate type containing the specified data. Supports DateTime cells, Number cells, and Text cells. All unknown types are converted to strings.

member.summary: Generate a header Cell tag containing the specified text.

member.summary: Generate a paragraph Cell tag containing the specified text.

member.summary: Generate a paragraph Cell tag containing the specified text.

member.summary: Generate an empty Cell tag.

member.name: M:WithoutHaste.DataFiles.MSExcel2003XmlFile.GenerateTextCell(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generate a Cell tag containing the specified text.
